channel.title: Kef on Erin's Audio Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Kef on Erin's Audio Corner

item.title: Kef Ci3160RL-THX In-Wall Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review This speaker was sent to me by the owner directly from the retailer as a store demo.

item.title: Kef Reference 1 Meta Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by Kef for review. I was not paid for my review and Kef has not seen the data or review prior to release.

item.title: Kef Q250c Center Channel Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review Kef loaned me this speaker to review. They have not seen the review prior to publication.

item.title: Kef Q150 Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review I purchased this speaker myself with help from Patreon funds.

item.title: Kef Q650c Center Channel Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review Kef loaned me this speaker to review. They have not seen the review prior to publication.

item.title: Kef R5 Floorstanding Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review The review on this website is a brief overview and summary of the objective performance of this speaker.

item.title: Kef LS50 Speaker Drive Unit Testing
item.description: Up for test is the raw drive unit from Kef’s flagship LS50 monitor. This bookshelf speaker set has gotten a whole lot of praise over the years and as of this writing (02/03/2020) is currently priced at $899 on Amazon (affiliate link here), if you feel so inclined to purchase them.

item.title: Kef R300 Speaker Drive Unit Testing
item.description: By now you’ve probably seen my testing of the Kef Q100 drive unit. I had read the next step in the Kef Uni-Q line are the drivers in the “R” series.

item.title: Kef Q100 Speaker Drive Unit Testing
item.description: As with the Kef HTS3001SE I tested, I ordered a set of the Kef Q100 Bookshelf speakers in order to remove and review the raw Q100 driver itself.
